title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - The source path is displayed incorrectly in the declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the issue, run the code provided in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. directory. Please note that these tests may generate false positives due to the absence of filename checking in the harness verification of messages. It has been observed that AJDT omits the filename if it does not make sense to AJDT.
OB: The source path in the declare warning messages for .class files from injars is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class' format.
EB: The source path in the declare warning messages for .class files from injars should be displayed in the 'app/Main.class' format.
SR:
1. Run the code provided in the tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. directory.
2. Observe the source path in the declare warning messages for .class files from injars.
3. Note that the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class' format.
